data.title: Where To Watch
data.meta_description: Doctors labor to save lives in the emergency room of a busy Chicago hospital.
data.text:
Tuesday, August 20

6:00 AM

Ames vs. Kovac

Season 13 • Episode 5

Abby prepares to return to work; Kovac tries to recall his treatment of a stroke patient.

Tuesday, August 20

7:00 AM

Heart of the Matter

Season 13 • Episode 6

Dr. Kovac fears for the worst as he awaits the jury's decision between himself and Curtis Ames.

Tuesday, August 20

8:00 AM

Jigsaw

Season 13 • Episode 7

Abby and Kovac hire a nanny to care for their son; Morris and Sam treat a belligerent patient.

Tuesday, August 20

8:55 AM

Reason to Believe

Season 13 • Episode 8

Abby and Kovac argue about a diagnosis when a woman shows signs of spousal abuse.

Tuesday, August 20

10:00 AM

Scoop and Run

Season 13 • Episode 9

Abby responds to a bus crash; Neela accepts an invitation from Gates.

Tuesday, August 20

11:00 AM

Tell Me No Secrets ...

Season 13 • Episode 10

Dr. Pratt has a hard time coming to terms with his brother's newly-discovered sexual orientation.

Wednesday, August 21

6:00 AM

City of Mercy

Season 13 • Episode 11

Gates betrays the trust of a homeless boy seeking help for his friend.

Wednesday, August 21

7:00 AM

Breach of Trust

Season 13 • Episode 12

Pratt and Hope question whether they are responsible when a patient dies.

Wednesday, August 21

8:00 AM

A House Divided

Season 13 • Episode 13

Kovac is jealous when Abby pays a lot of attention to a patient.

Wednesday, August 21

8:55 AM

Murmurs of the Heart

Season 13 • Episode 14

Gates and Neela try to revive Meg after they find her unconscious in her car.

Wednesday, August 21

10:00 AM

Dying Is Easy

Season 13 • Episode 15

Pratt is questioned about the death of a patient; Neela scrubs in on a kidney-donor surgery.

Wednesday, August 21

11:00 AM

Crisis of Conscience

Season 13 • Episode 16

Gates and Kovac have a moral dilemma when a woman comes in with acute liver failure.

Thursday, August 22

6:00 AM

From Here to Paternity

Season 13 • Episode 17

A family has frostbite; Neela is jealous when Dr. Dubenko brings in a new surgical intern.

Thursday, August 22

7:00 AM

Photographs and Memories

Season 13 • Episode 18

A photographer comes into the ER with a terminally ill patient.

Thursday, August 22

8:00 AM

Family Business

Season 13 • Episode 19

Kovac and Gates must deal with the father of a young man with heart failure.

Thursday, August 22

9:00 AM

Lights Out

Season 13 • Episode 20

Kovac feels the pressure of a busy emergency room; Sam befriends a terminally ill photojournalist.

Thursday, August 22

10:00 AM

I Don't

Season 13 • Episode 21

The staff learns that surprise nuptials are about to take place.

Thursday, August 22

11:00 AM

Sea Change

Season 13 • Episode 22

Kovac and Abby acclimate to their new roles as husband and wife.

Saturday, August 24

5:00 AM

The Honeymoon Is Over

Season 13 • Episode 23

The new chief prepares to make changes in the ER; Kovac postpones his honeymoon.

Saturday, August 24

6:00 AM

The War Comes Home

Season 14 • Episode 1

Abby, Pratt and Morris try to figure out how to handle Dr. Morretti's new ER procedures.

Saturday, August 24

7:00 AM

In a Different Light

Season 14 • Episode 2

Dr. Moretti continues to institute new measures that cause many of the ER doctors to despise him.

Saturday, August 24

8:00 AM

Officer Down

Season 14 • Episode 3

A teenage wrestler comes into the ER with severe vomiting; Gates tries to help a child.

Saturday, August 24

8:55 AM

Gravity

Season 14 • Episode 4

A former patient decides to provide free beauty treatments in the ER.

Saturday, August 24

10:00 AM

Under the Influence

Season 14 • Episode 5

Moretti decides that Gates is ready to return to the ER; a young genius intern.

Tuesday, August 27

6:00 AM

The Test

Season 14 • Episode 6

Sam and Abby work on an attention-hungry patient who comes into the ER with elusive symptoms.

Tuesday, August 27

8:00 AM

Coming Home

Season 14 • Episode 8

Gates and Julia nurture their newfound romance, but a troubling call interrupts them.

Tuesday, August 27

10:00 AM

300 Patients

Season 14 • Episode 10

Kovac and Abby make plans to go to Croatia after Luka's father passes away.

Tuesday, August 27

11:00 AM

Status Quo

Season 14 • Episode 11

Sam has much in common with a patient; a woman rushes her son to the ER after he falls in gym class.

Wednesday, August 28

6:00 AM

Believe the Unseen

Season 14 • Episode 12

Abby checks out of rehab and finds her way back to the ER; Harold finds new confidence.

Wednesday, August 28

7:00 AM

Atonement

Season 14 • Episode 13

Pratt gets cold feet when Bettina gets serious about their relationship.

Wednesday, August 28

8:00 AM

Owner of a Broken Heart

Season 14 • Episode 14

Abby considers telling Kovac the truth about her affair as she heads to Croatia.

Wednesday, August 28

9:00 AM

... As the Day She Was Born

Season 14 • Episode 15

Neela makes a quick decision about a patient with a torn aorta.

Wednesday, August 28

10:00 AM

Truth Will Out

Season 14 • Episode 16

Abby discovers a serious condition while treating a beaten teen.

Wednesday, August 28

11:00 AM

Under Pressure

Season 14 • Episode 17

Pratt decides to fight for his relationship with Bettina, despite her reluctance.

Thursday, August 29

6:00 AM

Tandem Repeats

Season 14 • Episode 18

The hospital psychologist works with Morris after his run-in with jewelry thieves.

Thursday, August 29

7:00 AM

The Chicago Way

Season 14 • Episode 19

Gates worries that his relationship with Sam is not as serious as he thought; Moretti visits.

Thursday, August 29

8:00 AM

Life After Death

Season 15 • Episode 1

Abby awakens after the ambulance explosion and rushes to check on Pratt.

Thursday, August 29

9:00 AM

Another Thursday at County

Season 15 • Episode 2

Dr. Banfield's arrival and attitude causes the ER staff to feel defensive.

Thursday, August 29

10:00 AM

The Book of Abby

Season 15 • Episode 3

Abby defends Sam when she goes before a nurses disciplinary board.

Thursday, August 29

11:00 AM

Parental Guidance

Season 15 • Episode 4

Banfield defends herself from a thief; Dr. Dubenko returns to the surgery team.

Saturday, August 31

6:00 AM

Doctors labor to save lives in the emergency room of a Chicago hospital.

Saturday, August 31

7:00 AM

Heal Thyself

Season 15 • Episode 7

Dr. Banfield remembers an experience at County when Dr. Green was treating her son.

Saturday, August 31

9:00 AM

Let It Snow

Season 15 • Episode 9

Neela must testify in court after a patient she treated dies.

Tuesday, September 3

6:00 AM

Dream Runner

Season 15 • Episode 12

Gates tries to save a patient who jumped out of a window while sleeping.

Tuesday, September 3

7:00 AM

Love Is a Battlefield

Season 15 • Episode 13

Morris tries to help a girl who was hit while riding her bike.

Tuesday, September 3

8:00 AM

A Long, Strange Trip

Season 15 • Episode 14

Dr. Morgenstern visits County General when he discovers an old mentor is ill.

Tuesday, September 3

9:00 AM

The Family Man

Season 15 • Episode 15

A car accident in the ambulance bay severely injures a mother.

Tuesday, September 3

10:00 AM

The Beginning of the End

Season 15 • Episode 16

Banfield is determined to have a baby; Neela gives a girl good news about her mother's surgery.

Tuesday, September 3

11:00 AM

T-Minus-6

Season 15 • Episode 17

Dr. Carter tries to jump back into work at County but struggles with new procedures and technology.

Wednesday, September 4

10:00 AM

And In the End ...

Season 15 • Episode 22

Friends come to show their support when Dr. Carter opens a medical facility for the underprivileged.

Thursday, September 5

6:00 AM

24 Hours

Season 1 • Episode 1

Young doctors face life and death daily in the emergency room of a major hospital.

Thursday, September 5

8:00 AM

Day One

Season 1 • Episode 2

An elderly man insists on sustaining his ill wife on a respirator against her wishes.

Thursday, September 5

9:00 AM

Going Home

Season 1 • Episode 3

A mystery patient wanders through the hospital and continually breaks into song.

Thursday, September 5

10:00 AM

Hit and Run

Season 1 • Episode 4

Dr. Ross helps a boy whose schizophrenic mother is admitted to the hospital.
